function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of large-scale health data for research","Impact":"Potential misuse of data, privacy breaches, data security risks","Mitigation":"Stringent data privacy measures, anonymization of data, ethical review processes","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, secure data storage systems, encryption technologies","People":"Researchers, data scientists, healthcare personnel, patients","Owner":"Research institutions, data governance bodies"},{"Description":"Assumptions on quality assurance for clinical trials","Impact":"Risk of inaccuracies in real-world evidence research, potential impact on healthcare policies and interventions","Mitigation":"Development of specific quality assurance frameworks for real-world evidence research, interdisciplinary collaboration in research","Technologies":"Quality assessment tools, data validation technologies, interdisciplinary research platforms","People":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, research institutions, policymakers"}]}
